About Us

Graham has been a painter and decorator for 25 years, doing everything from basic paint jobs to full house redorations. Graham is versatile in all aspects of decorating, whether itâ€™s interior painting and wallpapering or exterior painting. A good painter and decorator of course is not just limited to painting a decorating but is skilled in variety of related trades such as tiling, bathroom fitting, etc and so is able to offer a complete refurbishment service.

Graham has worked for many companies over the years large and small gaining even more experience. Graham is now a sole trader covered all aspects of the trade.

Whatever your decorating or handyman needs we aim to provide first class, friendly and reliable service at a competitive price. We always undertake our work in a quiet, clean professional manner. Graham himself is a professional, committed and thorough painter and decorator who works to a high standard. He is friendly, enthusiastic and hardworking and genuinely enjoys making a difference not only to your surroundings but also for you.

For all painter/decorating/handyman jobs carried out in private dwellings for the householder during normal working hours (9am-6:30pm, Mondays to Fridays), the first 30 minutes costs Â£15 or the first hour costs Â£23. After that, we charge decreasing rates per hour as shown below: a whole day works out at Â£15/hour. These terms are for cash/cheque payment on completion. All materials and fixings supplied are charged at cost.

We reserve the right to specify a minimum 1 hour appointment for visits outside the St Austell area, unless these can be combined with another job in the same area.

Saturday appointments for working people

We realise that not everyone can manage to take time off work for appointments. So, we offer Saturday daytime appointments, with a minimum charge of Â£25, and a cost of Â£12.50 per 30 minutes thereafter.

Out of hours calls

If you need something done outside normal hours (bank holidays, Sundays and evenings), we'll do our best to help, but all calls are subject to a minimum charge of Â£30 for up to an hour, then Â£15 per 30 minutes thereafter.

Cancellations / missed appointments

Please cancel an unwanted appointment as soon as you know you will not be able to keep it, and make sure you are in when we arrive for a booked appointment. Otherwise, we waste time and money travelling to your home or property, and let other people down unnecessarily.

VAT

All prices include VAT at the current rate.

Painting and Decorating

Budget Refresh Painting Jobs, Changing Worktops, Construct and re-position Partition Walls, Filling in Cracks and Holes in Plaster or Woodwork, Fit Kitchens and Bathrooms, Fit Suspended Ceilings, Install and Upgrade Bathroom and Kitchen Facilities, Interior and Exterior Painting, Outside Painting Work, Painting a Fence, Doors and Windows, Putting up Shelves and Doors, Re-seal Bathrooms and Kitchens, Repairing and Removing Damaged Grout, Repairs to Plaster and Plasterboard, Sealing Baths and Sinks, Touching up Paintwork, Woodwork Painting

Wallpapering

Removing old wallpaper, Filling and making good wall surface, Hanging lining papers, Hanging lining papers horizontally (to avoid ridges), Hanging final decorative wallpaper, Hanging final repeat patterned paper, Hanging final bespoke block printed and hand painted panoramic scenes, Hanging final paper backed silk, suede & fabric,flock, textured, hand printed wallpaper, Hanging final american wallpapers with white boarders to trim

Gardening

All Hedge work, Decking, Fencing and Decorative work, Graveling, Lawn Mowing, Leaf Collection, Maintenance, Path and Driveway Clearance, Pond Installation, Slabbing, Patios and Driveways, Tree Surgery, Turfing and Landscaping,

Tiling

Bathroom Tiling, Cleaning Old and Discolored Grout, Fixing Shower Brackets, Floor Tiling, Kitchen Tiling, Living Room Tiling, Re-fitting Loose Tiles, Shower Room Tiling, Splashback Tiling, Steam Room Tiling, Wall Tiling, Wet Room Tiling

Roofing

Flat root repairs, Pitched roof repairs, Gutting repairing, Lead repair, Finding leaks, Fixing chimney pots

Odd Jobs

Guttering Repairs and Cleaning, Assembling Flat Pack Furniture, Fence and Gate Repairs, Moving Furniture, Putting Up TVs, Hanging curtains, rails and blinds, Draught Proofing, Shower Screens, Fitting Door and Window Locks, Smoke Alarms, Carbon Monoxide Detectors, Child-proofing Sockets and Cupboards, Fitting Stair Gates, Replacing Sash Window Cords, Hanging Pictures and Mirrors, Fitting Curtain Poles and Rails, Flat-Pack Assembly, Lifting and Shifting Furniture, Boxing in and Drought Proofing, Changing Handles and Locks, Wall Mounting Plasma Screens, Fitting Blinds and Curtains, Fitting Signage
